= Graph Annotation =

When the annotation content is intended for machines and is described by a set of triples about a resource, it is recommended to collect them in a graph and to refer to them. 

=== Named Graph ===

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Named_graph Named Graphs] is the idea that having multiple RDF graphs in a single document/repository and naming them with URIs provides useful additional functionality built on top of the RDF Recommendations.
